search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Snitcher (snitcher.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Snitcher is located at: [https://www.snitcher.com/pricing](https://www.snitcher.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
[![Image 1: Snitcher logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67ab33bf05c2fbfe62490e8d_Purple%20logo.svg)](https://www.snitcher.com/)

PRICING

Flexible pricing for teams that move fast
-----------------------------------------

Whether you’re a small team or scaling fast, our  transparent pricing grows with you. Get the tools you need to identify website visitors, prioritize leads, and drive revenue.

![Image 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67d88557ae34668346b41d11_Cart--Streamline-Fun-Stickers.png)![Image 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67d42585fd8b5ad0559f112c_Puzzle--Streamline-Fun-Stickers.png)

Free
----

$0

/mo

Try before you buy

Full access for two weeks to try our top-rated platform and assess our data.

Premium
-------

$69

/mo

The only  plan you need

Lock in a tier or scale as you grow with the best visitor ID platform on the market.

Agency
------

$249

/mo

Built for managing accounts

Manage multiple clients, automate workflows and enjoy volume discounts.

Trusted by REVENUE teams of all sizes

![Image 17: smallstep](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67af45f046090d42f95bfa41_project44.svg)

All of our features for all of our customers
--------------------------------------------

At Snitcher, we don’t gate features behind enterprise plans. No matter your size, you get to use every feature of our industry-leading platform.

![Image 18](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67c876e2cd6909f813cd0182_CheckCircle.svg)

Unlimited websites

![Image 19](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67c876e2cd6909f813cd0182_CheckCircle.svg)

Unlimited users

![Image 20](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67c876e2cd6909f813cd0182_CheckCircle.svg)

Unlimited history

![Image 21](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67c876e2cd6909f813cd0182_CheckCircle.svg)

Contact enrichment

![Image 22](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67c876e2cd6909f813cd0182_CheckCircle.svg)

Visitor activity tracking

![Image 23](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67c876e2cd6909f813cd0182_CheckCircle.svg)

Customer support

![Image 24](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67c876e2cd6909f813cd0182_CheckCircle.svg)

Exports & integrations

![Image 25](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67c876e2cd6909f813cd0182_CheckCircle.svg)

API access

![Image 26](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67c876e2cd6909f813cd0182_CheckCircle.svg)

Customer filtering

![Image 27](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67c876e2cd6909f813cd0182_CheckCircle.svg)

Automated workflows

![Image 28](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67c876e2cd6909f813cd0182_CheckCircle.svg)

LinkedIn Ads targeting

![Image 34](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67c876e2cd6909f813cd0182_CheckCircle.svg)

Custom reporting

![Image 35](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67c876e2cd6909f813cd0182_CheckCircle.svg)

B2B web analytics

![Image 36](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67d83778affe2f105236d371_Rocket--Streamline-Fun-Stickers.png)

Simple pricing that scales with you
-----------------------------------

Our plans  are based on the number of unique companies we ID each month.

Every company is counted once

Remove irrelevant companies from your total

All features Snitcher has to offer are included

![Image 37: Deliver personalized experiences at scale](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67ac691ace08236973c355f7_Deliver%20personalized%20experiences%20at%20scale.webp)

![Image 38: Snitcher logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67ac68195f6cf3edefa1f648_logo_purple.svg)

Powered by Snitcher

Deliver personalized experiences at scale
-----------------------------------------

Snitcher’s real-time identification API goes beyond identifying visitors—we’re powering  industry leaders with real-time data.

![Image 39](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67ac547ffbe95e90986ed0f5_directions.svg)

Build product features with intent data

![Image 40](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67ac54b442997040146d411b_automation.svg)

Enrich your platform with actionable insights

![Image 41](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67ac54b4a43d7ff518c99ef1_bell.svg)

Automate your most critical GTM workflows

What is Snitcher?

![Image 42](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67b45354d9807b90cb1f4792_minus.svg)![Image 43](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67b45354d9807b90cb1f4792_minus.svg)

Snitcher is a visitor identification platform that uncovers hidden website visitors and turns them into actionable leads. GTM teams use it to identify, enrich, and engage prospects the moment they show interest. Automate workflows, prioritize high-fit accounts, and connect with decision-makers at the right time.

Is Snitcher GDPR compliant?

![Image 44](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67b45354d9807b90cb1f4792_minus.svg)![Image 45](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67b45354d9807b90cb1f4792_minus.svg)

Yes, Snitcher is fully GDPR-compliant. We process data securely, filter out personally identifiable information (PII), and focus on firmographic insights. See our compliance documentation for details.

How does the Snitcher free trial work?

![Image 46](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67b45354d9807b90cb1f4792_minus.svg)![Image 47](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67b45354d9807b90cb1f4792_minus.svg)

14 days, full access, no credit card required.  
Try every feature, integrate with your tools, and get support from our team. When the trial ends, you’ll see your subscription options. We're here to help every step of the way, and when your trial ends, you can pick a plan that fits your needs

What are unique company identifications?

![Image 48](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67b45354d9807b90cb1f4792_minus.svg)![Image 49](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67b45354d9807b90cb1f4792_minus.svg)

Each identified company counts as one unique identification per month, no matter how many times they visit or how many employees from that company land on your site.

If 50 people from the same company visit multiple times, it still counts as one identification. Snitcher automatically filters out ISPs and irrelevant traffic, so you only pay for leads that actually matter.

How does Snitcher identify website visitors?

![Image 50](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67b45354d9807b90cb1f4792_minus.svg)![Image 51](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67b45354d9807b90cb1f4792_minus.svg)

Snitcher maps IP addresses to company data, enriches profiles with firmographic insights, and integrates with first-party data sources to improve accuracy.

Why should I pick Snitcher over other providers?

![Image 52](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67b45354d9807b90cb1f4792_minus.svg)![Image 53](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67b45354d9807b90cb1f4792_minus.svg)

Our data is more accurate, our customers love us, and we’re happy to prove it. Compare us side by side with other providers, and we’ll even show you how to do it without bias, so you can make the best choice for your business. We’re also a price leader, offering top-tier performance without the inflated costs.

### Still have questions?

Can’t find the answer you’re looking for? Shoot us a message.

[Start a chat ![Image 54](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67b45702a3401381ff4ea247_ChatTeardropDots.svg)](https://www.snitcher.com/pricing#)

![Image 55](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67c583f980cc621d991dd237_g2-fall-high-performer.svg)

Why wouldn’t you try the highest-rated visitor ID platform on the market?
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 56: Snitcher](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67ac9dd84af1df9361b2fefa_Snitcher.svg)

Uncover your hidden  
website visitors
--------------------------------------

![Image 57: G2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67ac9e7048eb3d3ca51fa8bc_G2.svg)![Image 58](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67ac9e7031a3e7e657f29a09_Stars.svg)

4.8 rating

![Image 59](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ab15ad6af5c41c3a02a1dc/67ac9ea6beb31afce6c39c11_credit-card-x.svg)

No credit card required

Flexible pricing for teams that move fast. Get the tools you need to identify website visitors, prioritize leads, and drive revenue.
